name: 哔哩轻小说-调试中无法正常加载

search.list: function Main(html){if(html.indexOf('收藏本书')!=-1){var myArray=new Array();myArray.push(html);return myArray;};return jsoups(html,'div.module > ol > li');}
search.title: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('收藏本书')!=-1){return jsoup(text,'div.book-cell > h2');};return jsoup(text,'h4.book-title');}
search.introduction: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('收藏本书')!=-1){return jsoup(text,'div.book-meta-r > p');};return jsoup(text,'p.book-desc');}
search.cover: function Main(text){if(text.indexOf('收藏本书')!=-1){return jsoup(text,'div.book-layout > img@attr->src');};return jsoup(text,'a > img@attr->data-original');}

detail.author: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'#bookDetailWrapper > div > div.book-layout > div > div');}
